help: [filter] filter (n: new; p: previously asked; h: hidden; a: all)
[filter] mode (o: ordered; r: random; e: exact answers; E: exact answers if simple; r: review (scores not store); u: unforgiving; c: case-sensitive)
[filter] maximum number of questions to ask
[debug ] list (t: terms; i: information; c: information in csv format; T: tags; s: detailed statistics) & exit
